issue.title: www.pinterest.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.pinterest.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.pinterest.com%2F) ### Comment > When loading Pinterest/opening the site with Adguard enabled, Pinterest loads and then the scroll bar vanishes. Due to this, scrolling is rendered impossible unless the adblocker is disabled. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/sfo5utp49uokss44ckcc0ckcwoo84k49ocspz4fvwo.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/tqeaaaf57280g48gk0488wscssg4wk8rsnqjd21u80.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser Extension v5.1.121 MV3 System version: | `Windows 10` Browser: | Chrome Tracking protection: | disabled Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base

Other:
Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion

Language-specific:
AdGuard German,
List-KR Browsing Security: | enabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled
